85624.「……むおあっ。\n なんということだ。この我輩が\n こんなスライムふぜいに:
...Moooooh. What a thing to say. To think that
I, myself, would be defeated by such a
Slime...

85625.「……あら。加勢に来たんだけど\n もう 終わっちゃったみたいね。:
Oh, no. I came to join you, but it looks like
it's all over now.

85626.「寒鬼団のリーダーとやら！\n さっさと ポワンさまを解放しなさい！！:
You're the leader of the Cold Demon Squad!
Release Master Treacle quickly!

85627.「……もはや これまで。\n 女王は 解放しよう……。: ...no longer. Let's let the queen go...

85629.「どこか おケガなどは ありませんか？\n すっごく 心配してたんですからっ。: Are you injured? We were so worried about you.

85630.「私は 大丈夫です。ありがとう ベラ。\n それに <cs_pchero>も。: I'm fine. Thanks Honey. And <cs_pchero> too.

85631.「ポワンさま。後のことは まかせてください。\n こいつに オシオキしてやります:
Mr. Treacle. Please leave the rest to me. I'll
make him do all the dirty work!

85632.「煮るなり 焼くなり 風呂のたきつけにするなり\n 好きにするがいい……。:
You can boil it, roast it, use it as a bath
water heater, whatever you like...

85633.「春を呼ぶ邪魔をしただけでなく\n ポワンさまにまで 手を出すなんて 許せない。:
Not only did you interrupt me to call for
spring, but I cannot allow you to lay a hand
on Treacle-sama. You'd better brace yourself!

85635.「この者には たとえ 悪事とわかっていても\n 春が来ることを 拒みたかった理由:
This person must have had a reason for wanting to deny the coming of spring, even if they knew it was a bad thing. We should ask that
first.

85637.「……我輩は 苦しみから 解放されたかった。\n 春が訪れると 我輩の頭に 花が:
I wanted to be free from suffering. When
spring comes, a flower blooms on my head. And
yellow powder falls...

85638.「すると どうだ……。\n 両目からは涙が とめどなく あふれ続け\n ハナから:
And then, well... the tears stop streaming
from both eyes, and the sap begins to trickle
from Hana's...

85639.「それって もしかしなくても\n 花粉症に なっただけなんじゃ……？:
Could it be that I'm just suffering from hay
fever without having to worry about it?

85640.「この苦しみは 体験した者にしか わからぬ！:
Only those who have experienced this pain know
what it is like!

85641.「……なるほど そういうことでしたか。\n じつは 妖精の中にも そのような症状:
I see...I see what you mean. As a matter of
fact, some of the fairies were beginning to
suffer from such symptoms.

85642.「ちょうど 妖精王のみが知る秘術を用いて\n 特効薬を作ったばかりなのです。\n:
I have just created a special remedy using a
secret technique known only to the fairy king.
Just drink this and you'll be fine now.

85643.「おおお……。なんということだ。\n 本来ならば 憎んで当然の相手に\n このよ:
Oh, my... what a thing. To show such mercy to
someone you should normally hate...

85644.「我輩が まちがっていた……。\n 暴力などに訴えず 最初から 素直に\n あな:
I was wrong, I should have asked for your help
instead of resorting to violence.

85645.「ありがとう 妖精の女王。\n そして 迷惑をかけて すまなかった。\n 春の妖:
Thank you, Fairy Queen. And I'm sorry for all
the trouble I put you through. Spring fairies
and mercenary Slime...

85646.「我輩は 妖精の国の樹木のひとつに戻り\n 静かに 春の訪れを待つとしよう。\n:
I shall return to one of the trees in Fairy
Land and quietly await the coming of spring.
Farewell, then...

85647.「ポワンさま！ 私 ずっと 自分には\n 足りないものがあるって 思ってたんです:
Treacle! I always thought I was missing
something, but now I know what it is!

85648.「私に足りないのは ポワンさまみたいに\n みんなを包み込むような 大きくて\n:
What I lack is a big, wide, open, kind heart
like Treacle's that embraces everyone!

85649.「あなたが それに気づいてくれたのなら\n 今回 私が さらわれたことも\n 無:
If you have realized this, then perhaps my
being kidnapped this time was not in vain.

85650.「さて。私は 妖精王の会合に 参加するため\n ふたたび 旅に出なければなりませ:
Well. I have to travel again to attend the
meeting of the fairy kings. I'll leave the
rest to you, Honey.

85651.「はいっ わかりました。\n おまかせください ポワンさま！:
Yes, I understand. Leave it to me, Master
Treacle!

85653.「<cs_pchero>も ご苦労さま！\n いったん 戻りましょうか。\n 春:
And <cs_pchero>, thanks for your efforts!
Shall we go back now? We must call Spring with
the Herald of Spring!

85654.「それじゃあ さっそく\n 春風のフルートを吹いて 春を呼ぶわね！:
Well then, let's get right to it and blow the
Herald of Spring and bring on Spring!

85655.「……やったわ！！\n 今年も無事に 妖精の国に\n 春を呼ぶことが できたわ！:
...we did it! We've successfully brought
spring to Fairy Land again this year!

85656.<center>……我輩は 元寒鬼団長アレル樹。\n妖精の女王のくれた 薬のおか:
I am the former Cold Demon Tree Alleru. Thanks
to a potion given to me by the Fairy Queen, I
was freed from the torments of hell...

85657.「よかったじゃない！\n さすが ポワンさまの作った お薬は\n 効き目が ちが:
That's great! As expected, the medicine made
by Treacle is very effective.

85658.<center>春の妖精と 傭兵スライムよ。\n迷惑をかけて すまなかった……。:
I'm the Spring Fairy and the Mercenary Slime.
I'm sorry for all the trouble I've caused
you... thank you... thank you...

85659.「もう あんなことしちゃ ダメよ。\n それじゃ 元気でね～！！:
Don't ever do that again. Well then, take
care~!

85660.「はあ……。今回は 大変だったわね。\n 寒鬼団も もう現れることはないでしょう:
Well... it's been a hard time this time. I'm
sure the cold demons won't show up again, so
we can finally breathe a sigh of relief.

85661.「これも 全部 <pc>が\n 助けに来てくれた おかげね。\n 本当に ありが:
All of this would not have been possible
without <pc> coming to my rescue.
Thank you so much!

85662.「これ お礼だから。\n エンリョしないで 受け取ってね！: It's a thank-you. Don't enlist, just take it!

85663.「せっかく春が来たんだから もうしばらく\n ゆっくりしていってね！ 春になった:
Now that spring has come, please take it easy
for a while longer! Fairy Land is so beautiful
in spring!
